nodes.text: This Week! in Star Wars is a current affairs YouTube show produced by StarWars.com featuring news about the latest Star Wars media, products, and other developments. It is hosted by StarWars.com associate editor Kristin Baver and serves as a spin-off of The Star Wars Show.

This Week! in Star Wars was launched on January 29, 2020 as a spinoff of The Star Wars Show, which shifted to a monthly release format. The show was hosted by StarWars.com associate editor Kristin Baver. Between May 28 and June 18, 2020, the show took a break after StarWars.com decided not to release any new videos
and stated that they wanted to "let other voices be heard" as a result of the Black Lives Matter movement and the George Floyd protests.
